description:
Alone in Space, only guided by Your commands to fulfill her mission: Finding Water.

While technology on Earth has been tremendously evolved and enhanced, some poor souls out in outer space still rely on materials and parts from the past. Thus, the only way to communicate Your commands are by using Morse code to send them through the void of space.

Help Our Lonesome Discoverer finding her ways through dangerous terrain!

./- (called "Dot Slash Dash" or DSD for short) is a 2d platformer created by Lukas "Delta" Vavra and Maxi "Exxag" Nothnagel for the GMTK-Jam 2019, adhering the theme "only one".
